ygData.subject: Re: Another newbie fletcher!
ygData.msgSnippet: With the new change to make it easier to make arrows, it is much more costly to fletch for practice.  I recommend spending as many practices as you can Also
ygData.messageBody:
With the new change to make it easier to make arrows, it is much more
costly to fletch for practice. I recommend spending as many practices
as you can

Also check out my referance page on Fetching and Bowyering.

http://24.1.216.195/1/eq/fletchingstat.htm



--- Nigel Birtley <samsar@...> wrote:
> From: "Nigel Birtley" <samsar@...>
>
> Hail All
>
> I know you are all probably sick to death of
> answering stupid newbie
> questions about fletching but I need to ask as I
> don't want to throw what
> little money I have into nothingness :)
>
> I am just setting out on my fletching career .. I am
> not doing this to make
> lots of cash but to save a little by making my own
> arrows and enhancing my
> char a little for roleplay .. I have spent 5 pracs
> in fletching so far and
> intend to spend more when I level .. possibly
> another 10/15 .. is this a
> good idea? What should I be making to improve me
> skills?
>
> Any advice in my eyes is good advice and I really
> need some .. those damned
> books I bought are no good at all .. I would have
> been better off buying
> components :)
>
> Thanks in advance
>
> Ashanak
> Level 4 Half Elf Ranger
> Samsar
> Level 11 Barbarian Warrior
> Bristlebane
>
>
>
------------------------------------------------------------------------
